DESCRIPTION: When summoned (played), #yShikigami cards grant #ytemporary #yHP. Certain #yShikigami also grant unique powers to help your or hinder the enemy. Whenever your #ytemporary #yHP is depleted or you summon another #yShikigami, you will lose the previous #yShikigami's powers and their corresponding card will enter your discard pile.
Each #yShikigami belongs to a certain #yFaction, denoted on your #ytemporary #yHP counter.
A creature with this debuff receives extra damage equal to the amount of stacks whenever it takes direct or or #yProjectile damage. Removed at the start of the creature's turn.
Your next Attack deals double damage. This power is then reduced by #b1 unless no damage is dealt.
Whenever your #yShikigami would receive #rlethal damage reduce this power by #b1. If it has more than #b1 #ytemporary #yHP, set incoming damage to #ytemporary #yHP - 1.
Channel an Orb that will activate the listed effect when the counter ticks down to #b0. Reduce the counter by #b1 at the start of your turn or whenever you play a card.
Look at the top #bX cards of your draw pile. You may place any of them at the bottom of your draw pile.
Roll a #bsix-sided dice. The listed effect is activated when your dice roll result is equal to or greater than #bX.
Deal damage to the frontmost enemy.
This #yShikigami has no special power.
This #yShikigami has no special power.

This #yShikigami has no special power.
This #yShikigami has no special power.
While this #yShikigami is active, whenever you play an Attack, apply an equal amount of #yPenetrated instead of dealing damage.
This #yShikigami has no special power.
While this #yShikigami is active, whenever this #yShikigami takes damage, gain an equal amount of Block.

While this #yShikigami is active, attach #yEnmusubi to a random card in your draw pile at the end of your turn. |While this #yShikigami is active, attach #yEnmusubi to a random card in your draw pile upon being summoned and at the end of your turn.
While this #yShikigami is active, your #yLuck dice roll results is always fixed at #b6.
Upon exiting this #yShikigami form, gain [E] and draw #b3 cards.|Upon exiting this #yShikigami form, gain [E] and draw #b4 cards.
When replaced by another #yShikigami, #yCountdown #b1 : return this #yShikigami's card from the discard pile to your hand.
Upon being summoned, #yCountdown #b4 : put #b2 #yGolden #yFeather into your hand.|Upon being summoned, and exit #yCountdown #b4 : put #b2 #yGolden #yFeather into your hand.

Upon being summoned, gain #b1 #yUnyielding. While this #yShikigami is active, whenever it takes #b3 or more unblocked damage, gain #b1 #yStrength. |Upon being summoned, gain #b1 #yUnyielding. While this #yShikigami is active, whenever it takes #b3 or more unblocked damage, gain #b2 #yStrength.
Upon being summoned, deal damage proportional to the amount of times you have summoned #yShikigami this turn.

Upon being summoned, heal #b2 HP. While this #yShikigami is active, whenever you heal HP, gain #b1 #yStrength. |Upon being summoned, heal #b3 HP. While this #yShikigami is active, whenever you heal HP, gain #b1 #yStrength.
Upon exiting this #yShikigami form, gain #b1 #yRally. |Upon exiting this #yShikigami form, gain #b2 #yRally.
Upon being summoned, lose #b1 HP and draw #b1 card.
Upon being summoned, place #b1 #yGolden #ySeimei at the bottom of your draw pile.|Upon being summoned, place #b1 #yGolden #ySeimei+ at the bottom of your draw pile.

Upon exiting this #yShikigami form, apply #b2 #yWeak to ALL enemies. If it is the enemy's turn, also apply #b2 #yVulnerable to ALL enemies.|Upon exiting this #yShikigami form, apply #b3 #yWeak to ALL enemies. If it is the enemy's turn, also apply #b3 #yVulnerable to ALL enemies.
Upon being summoned, an enemy whose current HP is equal to or less than this #yShikigami's #ytemporary #yHP dies.

While this #yShikigami is active, whenever you #yDivine, deal #yProjectile damage equal to the amount of cards #yDivined.|While this #yShikigami is active, whenever you #yDivine, deal #yProjectile damage equal to #b2x the amount of cards #yDivined.
When this card is drawn, heal #b2 HP. NL This cannot be overwritten by another card which "attach" an additional effect.
When this card is played, your currently active #yShikigami gains #b2 #ytemporary #yHP. NL This cannot be overwritten by another card which "attach" an additional effect.
When this card is drawn, deal #b6 damage to a random enemy. NL This cannot be overwritten by another card which "attach" an additional effect.
When this card is drawn, discard #b2 cards. NL This cannot be overwritten by another card which "attach" an additional effect.
When this card is used, take #b3 damage. NL This cannot be overwritten by another card which "attach" an additional effect.
Cards that can only be created during combat. e.g. Shiv, Miracle
